description: Provides a CLI shell to access and manipulate the router's configuration.

properties.name: shellname
properties.label: Shell Name
properties.description: Assign a name to this shell to identify the stream to assign it to a dashboard component.

properties.name: adminrole
properties.label: Admin Role
properties.description: Assign a predefined admin role to this shell. The admin role must be preconfigured and limits this CLI shell to certain operations.
